title: Hello Brother - Novel Updates
genre: Martial Arts   Romance   Shounen Ai   Sports
author: Blue Diver   블루다이버
description:
Having deeply fallen for the charm of Taekwondo, Daehan comes to Malaysia to participate in global volunteer activities as the team leader of the Taekwondo department. Due to his face that easily gets him misunderstood as a woman, he gets hit on in a cafe. After bearing with it, just when his patience reaches its limit and he is about to deal with the man, someone takes care of the guy in his stead.

That person says “I … am from the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (aka North Korea)”>
